title: Tadashii Itsuwari kara no Kishou

synonyms: Zutto Mayonaka de Ii no ni.
I Wish It Was Midnight All the Time.
The Cracker on the Back of My Mind
Waking Up From a Correct Flasehood
alternative_titles.ja: 正しい偽りからの起床

synopsis: Music videos for Byoushin wo Kamu and Nouri Ue no Cracker animated by the professional animator Waboku. The songs themselves were released on the album "Tadashii Itsuwari kara no Kishou" by the band "Zutto Mayonaka de Ii no ni." on November 14, 2018.
